textAfterTable: great academics small class sizes will work with me (20-30) professors care about their students Login to rate or flag the reviews Daniel from Littleton, CO 01/13/2010 Reviewer is A current student here. 21 out of 21 people found this review useful. 2 of 86 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Surfer-dudes, likes to go the mall (Fashion and Mission Valley), student leaders, academically savvy students, confident and competent students. Tips for prospective students Get involved. The best way to be become a submersed college student is to meet as many people as you can, including professors. Get out of the dorm and feel the Sun--shorts and t-shirts in the Winter! As soon as you can find fun, your well on your way to a great time in college. Find a way to relax from your studies whether it may be going down to new student lounge (Frank's Lounge) or going to the club downtown, there are a number of opportunities to satisfy both your academic and social appetite.
